description:
Designed for emerging climbers and those who appreciate comfort, the Reflex V's stretch knit upper provides a sock-like fit without sacrificing versatility and performance. The stiffer sole and Vision rubber support your feet on footholds as you build toe strength. Suited to gym climbing or cragging, the Reflex V is a great and affordable option when developing your technique.

  • Stretch knit upper has varying thickness to balance stretch and breathability
  • Slight asymmetric shape and flat toe profile add comfort and versatility
  • Dual hook-and-loop closure provides a snug fit
  • PAF heel system distributes pressure over the heel for a comfortable fit
  • Scarpa Vision rubber is sticky and long lasting
  • Members typically downsize 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size
name: Scarpa Reflex V Rock Shoes - Men's
